# cudo Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cudo" {
  api_key    = "api-key"
  project_id = "my-project"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) Your API key
- `disable_tls` (Boolean) Whether to connect using TLS
- `endpoint` (String) API endpoint
- `project_id` (String) Which project id to use
